commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Coming in!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Welcome. Thanks for coming today.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't mention it. Thanks for inviting me. I'm glad I get to come over to your place to hang out.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You mentioned a game you wanted to play with me... What kind of game is it? A video game?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is this...a VR game?! No way! I've never played a VR game before!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This will be my first time playing it at home, so I'm really excited.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: VR games are supposed to make you feel like you're actually in the video game world, right? I wonder what that's gonna be like! I can't wait!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Here's the headset. You have to put it on to play the game.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks. Whoa, this thing is so cool! It looks like it came out of a sci-fi movie! But wait, what are you gonna use?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm gonna use this.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? Isn't that the Rina-chan Board you use during live shows?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yup. This Rina-chan Board is equipped with a VR headset function as well, so we're all set.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really?! When did that feature get added...? Man, your Rina-chan Board gets more high-tech every day...

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: That's everything set up. I'll start the game.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa! I really am in a virtual world! Huh? Is this a game, or is it real life?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's a game. But the graphics are pretty realistic and if you're not holding your controllers... Actually, even with the controllers it's hard to tell the difference. Whoa!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Check out your stats and...start!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Take that...and that! Ack, I messed up... One more time!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Urgh, this game is pretty hard... But it's fun! I HAVE to beat it!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Phew, that was fun.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Huh? Is this the game, or is it real life...?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This is the real world now. *Chuckle* You got really into it, huh? I heard that VR games were pretty immersive. I guess it's true after all!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: S-Sorry! I just took off without you halfway through...

commands.select_args: ||You must've been having a lot of fun.|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You don't need to be sorry! I was having fun too!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: R-Really? I'm a bit embarrassed, but as long as you were having fun, then I'm happy.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You're normally so quiet and reserved, so you must have been having the time of your life.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Yeah... It was super realistic and there was so much to do in there that it totally sucked me in. VR games sure are fun.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They sure are. I'm glad I got to share my first VR gaming experience with you.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm also glad I got to play with you. This was actually my first time playing video games with someone in my own room like this...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? Sounds like the two of us had a lot of firsts today.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: U-Um, there's actually one more game that I wanna play with you... It's another VR game.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? Then let's jump into our second round! I messed up a lot in the last one 'cause it was my first time, but I'm sure I'll be better this time around!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll show you how good I can be too. Here we go! Game on!
